title: Ward Skin
body: I recently unlocked a ward skin via hex tech crafting but when i got into a champion select it wasn't there. I re logged but this did not fix the problem. The ward skin did have a bugged name like "_wardskin_122_". Any Help?

replies.body: It looks like you unlocked the Banner of the Horse Ward!  There's actually a display issue right now, and some ward skins are not selectable despite being unlocked on the account.  I have no eta for a fix right now, but I confirmed it is in fact on the account.  I hope that helps give some relief!
